Premier League
Everton - Tottenham: terrible injury for Andr√© Gomes, His expelled in tears
At the match between Everton and Tottenham, the Korean Son was guilty of a fault on the Portuguese Andre Gomes, hurting him very seriously, to the point of tearing the man in tears.
03 Nov 2019, 18:20 by Antoine Chirat

Premier League 2019/2020: Top 10 scorers




Sad moment on the lawn of Goodison Park. While Tottenham led 1-0 on Everton's pitch, Korean Heung-min Son was guilty of a big foul on Portugal's Andr√© Gomes. Very quickly, the Spurs forward seemed horrified at the extent of the injury, to the point of bursting into tears on the lawn as the caretakers entered the lawn. The referee logically expelled Son who accepted his sanction apologizing to his opponents.
